name: 梁斯寧
objective: This course provides students with the training of English language and professional communication to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Covering a range of workplace- and profession-related topics, the course will help students develop their communicative competence in professional English. Students are expected to actively participate in the class discussions and activities designed to simulate different professional contexts.
